title: (x) McDonald's & Sod the Garden grotesques - Akzidenz-Grotesk, Helvetica {Ralf Hermann, Jan E}
content:
Hi  
Any ideas wha this font is, I'm sure it's something simple?  
It's used by Mcdonalds at the moment in the UK.  
Also anyone know what this font is? (very similar) [http://www.sodthegarden.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203218/http:/www.sodthegarden.co.uk/ "http://www.sodthegarden.co.uk")

Many thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203218/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_43.png) | 9.66 KB |
author: markthedoc

comments.content: Or, if you have it, use Helvetica Black and play with it a little.

Cheers for the help there fellas.  
any ideas on the [http://www.sodthegarden.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203218/http:/www.sodthegarden.co.uk/ "http://www.sodthegarden.co.uk") font please?
